text:
Hi everyone, new to to this:

I am trying to create a workflow that adds a line item to a deal, I guess it is going to be with a custom code, but having trouble finding the right code template and getting errors.

More in depth, the line item should also be created, with a discount amount, which it's value will come from a numeric property on the Deal level.

If anyone can show me a sample code or direct me to the right direction (i'm not a coder)

Hi <@U07DHL68LDQ>, you’ll probably want this <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/crm/objects/line-items#post-%2Fcrm%2Fv3%2Fobjects%2Fline_items|endpoint>, and you can bring the numeric property in by following these <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/automation/custom-code-actions#add-HubSpot-properties-to-your-custom-code|directions>. Line items are tricky, though, and have requirements that can be hard to find.
